title: Introduction
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:t}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(o){const i={h1:"h1",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...o.components};return t(n,{children:[e(i.h1,{children:"¿What is Chonza?"}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"Introduction"}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["Chonza is a collection of components and styles that can be used to build web applications. It is designed to be simple and easy to integrate into your ",e(i.strong,{children:"ReactJS"})," and ",e(i.strong,{children:"NextJS"})," projects."]}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"Features"}),"
",t(i.ul,{children:["
",t(i.li,{children:["
",t(i.p,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"Simple"}),": Chonza is designed to be simple and easy to use. It is built on top of TailwindCSS and Framer Motion, which makes it easy to integrate into your projects."]}),"
"]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:["
",t(i.p,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"Customizable"}),": Chonza is highly customizable. You can easily change the colors, fonts, and other styles to match your brand."]}),"
"]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:["
",t(i.p,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"Responsive"}),": Chonza is designed to be responsive. It works on all devices, from mobile to desktop."]}),"
"]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:["
",t(i.p,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"Open Source"}),": Chonza is open source. You can use it for free in your personal and commercial projects and contribute to its development."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"Installation"}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"You only need to install the dependencies and import the components that you want to use in your project."}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"Dependencies:"}),"
",t(i.ul,{children:["
",t(i.li,{children:["
",t(i.p,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"ReactJS"}),": Chonza is built on top of ReactJS, so your project needs to have ReactJS installed, for example you can use it with NextJS, Astro or Create React App."]}),"
"]}),"
",t(i.li,{children:["
",t(i.p,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"TailwindCSS"}),": Chonza uses TailwindCSS for styling, so you need to have TailwindCSS installed in your project."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"Credits"}),"
",t(i.p,{children:["Chonza is inspired by other libraries like ",e(i.strong,{children:"ShadCN"})," and ",e(i.strong,{children:"MagicUI"})," so I want to give them credit for their work and inspiration, also I want to thank the ",e(i.strong,{children:"TailwindCSS"})," team for their amazing work."]})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:t}=n.components||{};return t?e(t,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};
